scene_description_enriched: A figure, identified as Christ, is depicted seated on a throne. He has a halo and is gesturing with his right hand while holding a globe in his left. The throne is elaborate, with architectural elements suggesting a Gothic style, including pointed arches and pinnacles. The background is a rich tapestry of gold squares interspersed with blue and pink, framed by decorative borders. The scene is set within a stylized architectural framework, possibly representing a celestial or divine space.
